input_values: Thanks for sharing this clear overview of LLMs and their applications. The attached document has useful examples of real-world use cases, limitations, and ethical considerations—especially the sections on fine-tuning and prompt design. Has anyone experimented with these approaches in class projects? I’d love to hear about your experiences. — Emma
